# current()

**Type Method**

Returns an indexed-collation instance for the current table view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class func current() -> Self
```

## Return Value

A [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UILocalizedIndexedCollation] object or `nil` if there was a problem creating the object.
title: current()
